bandwidth-unit.help: Unit of measurement for maximum bandwidth for this shaper (Kbps, Mbps or Gbps).
bandwidth-unit.name: bandwidth-unit

diffserv-forward.help: Enable/disable changing the Forward (original) DiffServ setting applied to traffic accepted by this shaper.
diffserv-forward.name: diffserv-forward

diffserv-reverse.help: Enable/disable changing the Reverse (reply) DiffServ setting applied to traffic accepted by this shaper.
diffserv-reverse.name: diffserv-reverse

diffservcode-forward.help: Forward (original) DiffServ setting to be applied to traffic accepted by this shaper.
diffservcode-forward.name: diffservcode-forward

diffservcode-rev.help: Reverse (reply) DiffServ setting to be applied to traffic accepted by this shaper.
diffservcode-rev.name: diffservcode-rev

max-bandwidth.help: Upper bandwidth limit enforced by this shaper (0 - 16776000). 0 means no limit. Units depend on the bandwidth-unit setting.
max-bandwidth.name: max-bandwidth

max-concurrent-session.help: Maximum number of concurrent sessions allowed by this shaper (0 - 2097000). 0 means no limit.
max-concurrent-session.name: max-concurrent-session

max-concurrent-tcp-session.help: Maximum number of concurrent TCP sessions allowed by this shaper (0 - 2097000). 0 means no limit.
max-concurrent-tcp-session.name: max-concurrent-tcp-session

max-concurrent-udp-session.help: Maximum number of concurrent UDP sessions allowed by this shaper (0 - 2097000). 0 means no limit.
max-concurrent-udp-session.name: max-concurrent-udp-session
